tool_description: Validates job posting content against specific requirements and guidelines of different job platforms to ensure successful posting.

job_description_text.description: Complete job description text to validate

target_platforms.description: List of platforms to validate against

employment_type.description: Employment type: full-time, part-time, contract, or internship

salary_disclosed.description: Whether salary information is included in posting

error_messages: Unsupported platform: One or more target platforms are not supported
Content too long: Job description exceeds character limits for one or more platforms
Content too short: Job description doesn't meet minimum length requirements
Missing required information: Some platforms require additional fields not provided
Invalid employment type: Use one of [full-time, part-time, contract, internship]
Platform-specific violation: Content violates specific guidelines for one or more platforms
usage: Provide job description text, target platforms list, job title, location, and employment type. Optionally specify if salary is disclosed. The tool validates content against each platform's requirements and provides compliance status.

overall_compliance.description: Whether the posting meets all platform requirements

violations_found.description: List of requirement violations that need to be addressed

platforms_ready.description: Platforms where posting can be published without changes
